title: WTB Edd Roush / Evansville / Oakland City / Princeton, IN PCs
author: BosseFieldBoy

posts.post_title: WTB Edd Roush / Evansville / Oakland City / Princeton, IN PCs
posts.post_content:
I grew up in the Evansville, IN area and it has a rich small town baseball history.  I’m looking for any 19th Centrury - early 20th Century Postcards or other memorabilia from the area, especially if they include stars that came out of the
area, especially Edd Roush.

Please PM me if you have anything for sale.

Thanks,
Mike
